title: The Vampire Valkyrie:
description: The vampire novel "The Vampire Valkyrie" takes off where "The Dancing Valkyrie" concluded and resumes the tale of a young female vampire who just may be the most dangerous vampire in vampire fiction to date.The new novel,"The Vampire Valkyrie," by Pete Klein, is the story of a young vampire woman who is an erotic dancer at a topless club she owns in Schenectady, NY.
author: Peter Klein
